reason_for_inclusion: Strong linear baseline for sparse text; stable and interpretable coefficients with probabilistic outputs.
Effective margin-based classifier for text data, especially in high-dimensional TF-IDF spaces.
Bagged tree ensemble baseline with robustness against overfitting compared to single trees.
Powerful boosted-tree ensemble to capture non-linear patterns and feature interactions.
Instance-based non-parametric baseline to compare local-neighborhood behavior.
Simple non-linear baseline with high interpretability.
